amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete funding for payment of United Nations debt arrearages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to strike funding for payment of arrearages to meet obligations of membership in the United Nations, and to pay assessed expenses of international peacekeeping activities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 279 (Roll No. 392).
